getAllPSDELogics.logicName: 用人经理-我的offer-搜索栏计数器
getAllPSDELogics.name: 用人经理-我的offer-搜索栏计数器

getPSDELogicNodes.name: 待审批
getPSDELogicNodes.sql:
select
	count(1) as pending
from
	hr_offer_approval hoa
where
	hoa.STATUS = 'pending' and hoa.CREATE_UID  = ?

getPSDELogicNodes.name: 已审批
getPSDELogicNodes.sql:
select
	count(1) as past
from
	hr_offer_approval hoa
where
	hoa.STATUS = 'past' and hoa.CREATE_UID  = ?
